prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture, chibi proportions with large luminous multi-faceted geometric head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying crystallize strategy beehive. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, octahedral, fractal patterns, styled with Cherub crystallize influences. Outfit is unique: light grey with metallic sheen inspired by Silver and mid-grey with cool undertones inspired by communication ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents with crystallize spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor ABRIOND's profile: 'He who prepares his kingdom', Aethyr POP, Air element, Tarot The Hermit, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Virgo, embodying the essence: 'In ABRIOND's presence, nebulous visions crystallize into strategy her provident insight lays methodical plans that light the way ahead.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture
visual_elements.head_shape: large luminous multi-faceted geometric head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with luminous facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying crystallize strategy beehive
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, octahedral, fractal patterns, styled with Cherub crystallize influences

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents
visual_elements.primary_color: light grey with metallic sheen inspired by Silver
visual_elements.secondary_color: mid-grey with cool undertones inspired by communication
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who prepares his kingdom'
profile_data.essence: In ABRIOND's presence, nebulous visions crystallize into strategy her provident insight lays methodical plans that light the way ahead.
profile_data.angelic_role: Cherub of Provident Strategy; leads divine messengers.
profile_data.form_description: A luminous, multi-faceted geometric form that shifts between translucence and solid crystallography, representing the analytical precision of Air and the messenger's transformative nature. The form resembles an intricate merkaba-like structure with rotating geometric planes that suggest simultaneous stillness and motion.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silver represents Mercury/communication, white symbolizes purity of divine message, azure reflects Air element and celestial transmission. The shifting quality indicates the dynamic nature of strategic revelation.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structures reflect beehive wisdom, octahedron represents Air element in Platonic solids, fractal patterns demonstrate infinite strategic complexity
